definitions.definition: A quality of being inadequate ; a disadvantage , a fault .
A mark given for bad conduct to a person attending an educational institution or serving in the army.
That which one merits or deserves, either of good or ill; desert.

main_definition: A quality of being inadequate ; a disadvantage , a fault .
secondary_definitions: A mark given for bad conduct to a person attending an educational institution or serving in the army.
That which one merits or deserves, either of good or ill; desert.
